statements: SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE transport_mode = 'Train';
SELECT id, route_name, departure_time FROM schedules WHERE arrival_time > '2023-01-01';
SELECT route_name, departure_time FROM schedules WHERE transport_mode = 'Bus' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2023-02-01' AND '2023-02-28';
SELECT id, route_name FROM schedules ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT route_name, transport_mode, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE transport_mode = 'Bus' ORDER BY departure_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01' AND transport_mode IN ('Train', 'Bus') ORDER BY arrival_time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT transport_mode, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-02-01' ORDER BY departure_time LIMIT 7
SELECT transport_mode, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE arrival_time < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY arrival_time DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, route_name, transport_mode, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE transport_mode IN ('Train', 'Car') ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 6
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id FROM schedules WHERE arrival_time < NOW();
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE mode_of_transport = 'bus';
SELECT route_id, total_distance FROM routes ORDER BY total_distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' LIMIT 10;
SELECT s.*, r.mode_of_transport FROM schedules s INNER JOIN routes r ON s.route_id = r.route_id WHERE r.mode_of_transport = 'Bus';
SELECT route_id, AVG(total_distance) AS avg_distance FROM routes GROUP BY route_id HAVING AVG(total_distance) > 100;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time > '2022-03-15' AND arrival_time < '2022-04-01' ORDER BY route_id ASC, departure_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Buses WHERE bus_id = 1;
SELECT bus_route_id, bus_schedule FROM Buses ORDER BY bus_schedule DESC;
SELECT subway_id, subway_route_id, subway_schedule FROM Subways WHERE subway_schedule > '2022-01-01';
SELECT train_id, train_route_id FROM Trains WHERE train_route_id = 100 ORDER BY train_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Buses JOIN Trains ON Buses.bus_route_id = Trains.train_route_id;
SELECT * FROM Buses WHERE bus_id = 1;
SELECT bus_id, bus_route_id FROM Buses WHERE bus_schedule < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Trains ORDER BY train_id DESC;
SELECT train_route_id, COUNT(*) AS num_trains FROM Trains GROUP BY train_route_id;
SELECT subway_id, subway_schedule FROM Subways WHERE subway_route_id = 3 ORDER BY subway_schedule ASC;
SELECT * FROM buses ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT bus_id, bus_route FROM buses WHERE bus_route='Route A';
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-10-01 08:00:00' AND '2022-10-01 10:00:00';
SELECT train_id, train_route, departure_time FROM trains WHERE train_route='Route B' ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT subway_id, subway_line, arrival_time FROM subways WHERE arrival_time < '2022-09-30 18:00:00';
SELECT * FROM buses WHERE bus_route='Route A' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT train_id, train_route FROM trains WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01' AND arrival_time <= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY train_id;
SELECT * FROM subways WHERE subway_line='Line 1' AND departure_time < arrival_time ORDER BY departure_time, arrival_time;
SELECT schedule_id, transport_mode, route_id FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01' ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM subways JOIN schedules ON subways.subway_id=schedules.route_id WHERE departure_time < '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM buses_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, bus_number FROM buses_schedule WHERE departure_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains_schedule ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, mode_of_transport FROM routes WHERE mode_of_transport = 'bus';
SELECT stop_name, location FROM stops WHERE location LIKE '%station%';
SELECT * FROM buses_schedule WHERE departure_time >= '08:00:00' AND arrival_time <= '14:00:00';
SELECT bus_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM buses_schedule WHERE bus_number LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, train_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains_schedule WHERE departure_time < arrival_time;
SELECT route_name, mode_of_transport FROM routes WHERE mode_of_transport = 'bus';
SELECT stop_name, location FROM stops WHERE location = 'City Center' ORDER BY stop_name ASC;
